SYSTEM: OntoDDB.pdf: Página 5
12/11/2009
INCONVENIENTS
• Cost
– In development: Database, Web Application 
– In maintenance: database modifications, web pages 
modifications
• Long development time
• Very short amortization time
• Need of very technical resources
• Distance between researcher and developer
• Heterogeneity between different applications
• No reuse
speaker: SYSTEM
